016package org.lifstools.jmzqc;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.*;
019import java.time.OffsetDateTime;
020import java.util.Collections;
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.stream.Collectors;
023
024/**
025 * Root element of an mzQC file.
026 */
027public record MzQC(
028        String contactAddress,
029        String contactName,
030        List<ControlledVocabulary> controlledVocabularies,
031        OffsetDateTime creationDate,
032        String description,
033        List<BaseQuality> runQualities,
034        List<BaseQuality> setQualities,
035        String version) {
036
037    public MzQC        {
038        if (controlledVocabularies == null) {
039            controlledVocabularies = Collections.emptyList();
040        }
041        if (runQualities == null) {
042            runQualities = Collections.emptyList();
043        }
044        if (setQualities == null) {
045            setQualities = Collections.emptyList();
046        }
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Returns a reference to the internal list of quality metrics for the given
051     * run. Modifications are reflected in the object graph.
052     *
053     * @param index the zero-based array index of a run.
054     * @return the underlying list of qc metrics
055     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if arguments are invalid
056     */
057    @JsonIgnore
058    public List<QualityMetric> getRunQualityMetrics(int index) {
059        if (index >= 0 && index < runQualities().size()) {
060            return runQualities().get(index).qualityMetrics();
061        }
062        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can not access run " + index);
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * Returns a reference to the internal list of quality metrics for the given
067     * run. Modifications are reflected in the object graph.
068     *
069     * @param index the zero-based array index of a run.
070     * @param accession the cv accession for qc metrics to return
071     * @return the underlying list of qc metrics, filtered for accession
072     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if arguments are invalid
073     */
074    @JsonIgnore
075    public List<QualityMetric> getRunQualityMetricsByAccession(int index, String accession) {
076        if (index >= 0 && index < runQualities().size()) {
077            return runQualities().get(index).qualityMetrics().stream().filter((qm) -> {
078                return accession.equals(qm.accession());
079            }).collect(Collectors.toList());
080        }
081        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can not access run " + index);
082    }
083}
